name: CAO - OSA Sol - Lot 54
additionalNotes: CAO Osa Sol was named for the Olancho, San Augustin valley in Honduras which is fed by the pure spring waters of a crystal clear river where this blend’s unique wrapper leaf is grown. The beauty and tasteful yields of this breathtaking region result in an original and rich flavor profile, handmade in a handful of popular bigger ring gauge shapes. A savory medium-bodied blend of Nicaraguan, Honduran, and Connecticut Broadleaf long-filler tobaccos rests beneath the shimmering Honduran wrapper in a medium-bodied amalgam of wood, nuts, black pepper, and earth with a hint of sweetness.
